meta_data.title: It is by the Spirit You Are Sanctified, and it is by Bethany That You Get Sweet Galatians Stickers Soon
meta_data.subtitle: Galatians 5:16-18 Thanks to everyone who supports TMBH at  You're the reason we can all do this together!  Music by

transcription_data.text: the and my friends that's not this is a ten minute by the way our podcast in last week was weird we could podcast because it was a two person program we don't normally do that but i'm really grateful to my buddy jeff who edits the show and he does the music for it grateful to jeff for jumping in and lending another brain to what is a very pivotal and very important part of this letter that we're studying the book of galatians and i thought he did a great job and i'm super thankful to him so i hope you enjoyed our time with jeff as well i'm not gonna make a habit of that not because jeff isn't great jeff's awesome and not because i'm insecure i don't mind jeff showing me up every time he comes on that's cool guy knows what he's talking about but rather i like the format and i intend to stick with the format which is good format oh i did not even write that down in advance that wasn't even from a joke book i literally just thought of that for those of you don't know my name is matt and i said format uh... you had to you have to rewind it see if you catch it on your second listen oh i'm sweaty as so good so i have so many friends it's like that it's uh... man now we're gonna stick with this format though where pretty much it's it's me in the bible and we co-host the thing understand that's not entirely equitable because the bible's from god in everything and i'm some guy still i think it's a fun dynamic and for those of you who are maybe just jumping in maybe you jumped in last week and you're like oh it's to do stalking podcast it's not just every now and then i like to have jeff's brain on things no normally it is uh... one dude talking podcast you and i process through entire books of the bible together and we take as much time as we need to work through those books of the bible in this case we're in season five of the program we're on the book of galatians down to the last page of the book of galatians and it's taken a hundred ninety some episodes and i don't feel bad about that at all because what we get to do on this program with ten ish minutes of content every weekday what we get to do is we get to run down all the things that come up in sermons where the pastor is like there is this other super important thing we should go to this other part of the bible and i should tell you about this history thing but uh... you know because the time that'll have to be a conversation for another day well here it's always another day so we run down all of it and take our time and i'd rather like it that way further i appreciate a flexible y'all are just rolling with me as we do this daily podcast in real time against the backdrop of a real life with me and my family sometimes i record this one my feelings are hurt or i am grouchy or i am discouraged about the world sometimes i record this one i've really fun exciting things on the horizon and i'm brimming with optimism sometimes i record this when i'm just busy and frankly don't have much time to do it and every other emotion in between how's that different from your experience right it would be stupid for me to wait until i feel the perfect way to do this so that i can do what show just exactly the right vibe every time well it's done that's not how you encounter the bible if you're on the bible every day you bring to the table what you are that day it seems like the bible and the god behind it can handle that so i like that that is the tone and that is a style that we get to take as well and from time to time well that means you might get something weird so at any rate there we are i am on the last page of Galatians i turned over to Galatians 5 18 ish i'm staring down the barrel being done with this thing and that means we're gonna make a season pivot to season six which is to the book of philemon so for those of you who are new we have a little system around here that we do where we commemorate the conclusion of a season of the book of the bible by celebrating the fact that you put in the work to learn about this thing and to be a part of the conversation and to have a Galatians not just podcast season but a Galatians season of your life if you're anything like me you can picture where you were when you heard a song for the first time when i was doing that audiobook i was driving across Nebraska and Iowa now every time i drive across Nebraska and Iowa i think of that audiobook every time i go around that bend i think of that song that i heard the first time right there or you know when i was doing the project working on the back deck that is when i had Galatians in my life so i want to commemorate the seasons that we share together on this stuff both because we accomplished something but also because it is a season of your life and i genuinely think it's important to mark that so my friend Bethany makes these cool stickers that have a thematic image for each book of the bible and they're like achievement unlocked stickers are like stickers that you put on your helmet if you make a bunch of great plays and you play college football or awards that you get if you play video games for doing something really difficult or something that's hard to unlock their achievement unlocked stickers meant to celebrate meant to commemorate meant to acknowledge that hey you went out put in the work and took a season of your life to get Galatians in your hip pocket so as we wrap up this season on Galatians i'm gonna send out a sticker it's got a cool gold outline to it and that gold outline Galatians sticker is going to everyone who is supporting the podcast on any platform at any level doesn't matter even if it's just a tiny little bit if you're current in the mailing list because you're somehow participating in supporting this thing and making it happen i want to say thank you by sending you that gold outline sticker there are a few of you who go way above and beyond to degrees that don't totally make sense to me and i like to do something a little extra to acknowledge that and say thank you so i also make up these super limited edition hologram their thick heavy duty versions of the stickers almost like metallic almost more like a thick like magnet kind of feel they're really cool and i'm going to send those out to those of you who've gone way above and beyond and you know who you are so if you want to be on that mailing list and you want to get one of those Galatians stickers that are going to go out here in a little bit as we get to the end of this book you can check out the link that jeff puts down in the show notes about supporting the program or whatever also it's totally cool not to and i have a white outline one that we just sell on the website feel like i come on doesn't make i don't want to support a pocket like i just don't want to do that for whatever reason it doesn't make sense for me right now but you want the sticker to commemorate it cool you can still buy one they're not super expensive and it usually takes us a little bit to send them out but we will send it to you that is a lot of reset and getting everybody up to speed but there is bible stuff we need to do today as well so we're all our Galatians five sixteen through eighteen it's stuff we were talking about last week but i got a little more on this so i say live by the spirit and you'll not gratify the desires of the sinful nature for the sinful nature desires what is i turn two pages i just second contrary to the spirit desires what is contrary to the spirit and the spirit what is contrary to the sinful nature they're in conflict with each other so that you don't do what you want but if you're led by the spirit you're not under the law it seems like we're getting into conversation here in chapter five about how you live and what you do obviously how you respond to the temptation what's going on inside the nature of the individual that's what we talked about all last week with jeff and in that conversation jeff used the word sanctified to talk about this process by which the life by the spirit happens in the christian and the sin is defeated it diminishes it becomes not the thing that dominates your life you know we talked about that in terms of church history and bible and all kinds of other stuff and you can kind of hear in the word sanctify you can hear sanctus or sanctuary then the root there is it's just holiness it's being set apart for god so how does that happen okay well pretty obviously from what we're reading here in Galatians it happens by the spirit you don't sanctify yourself it might feel like it like i would say in last week but ultimately it is the spirit within us and by that i mean the holy spirit god the spirit within us that gives us the capacity to not sin or to choose not sin we receive that new nature when we become christians so right here at the end of that little passage is regulations 5 18 we're just getting another contrast between the law and another good thing about the christian life earlier on in the book of Galatians the contrast was almost exclusively regarding right standing before god or salvation to put it very bluntly you're not going to earn right standing before god through self-discipline and adherence to the law isn't going to happen curses anybody who doesn't keep every single thing written in this book of the law nobody can keep every single thing written in this book of the law the only way to right standing with god is through faith just like it was with Abraham that contrast runs through most of Galatians but we get here and now Paul is shifting into this so what do you do now and how is it supposed to feel now and how is it supposed to work now and he's dealing with the question of sanctification life by the spirit what does it look like so here we have just another contrast dealt with more quickly than the right standing with god contrast from earlier in Galatians but this other contrast is which one of these two things gets you to a place where you're resisting sin well it's not the law that does that it's not purely human will that does that but ultimately it is the spirit who makes sanctification possible it's the spirit who guides us in that and when that happens it really kind of flips the whole equation for why Christians do the stuff they do that is good and resist the stuff they don't do that isn't good and tomorrow we're going to talk about that flipping of the equation once again thank you to all of you for being here welcome to everybody who's new congratulations in advance on getting real close to the finish line here with the book of Galatians and once again if you want to be a part of the sticker thing we'll have them for sale that you can just buy the white outline ones on the website here and not too long or if in any way you're supporting the channel at any level you're going to get at least one of those gold outline ones and just like it's been in the past for those of you and you know who you are who've gone way above and beyond you're going to get the cool limited edition hologram ones is a way of saying thank you it doesn't measure up to what you've done at all but hopefully you get my meaning from it whether you support this ridiculous thing or not the fact that you're here is awesome i'm grateful for all of you thanks for making the bible a part of your daily rhythm with me it means world all right that's plenty for now i'm at this the 10 minute bible hour five plus we'll do the scenes
